search_general_talk_ch0215_00_lutia/4401:
Take a good look at your audience and pick the
style that you think will best appeal to them!
search_general_talk_ch0215_00_lutia/4402: Oh no! That didn’t go so well...
search_general_talk_ch0215_00_lutia/4406:
Let’s pretend to be judges and check out the
appealing performances of all our fans here!
search_general_talk_ch0215_00_lutia/4407:
Composed yet passionate... That’s exactly how
a fan should be!

The award for best appeal performance goes to...
this sync pair!
search_general_talk_ch0215_00_lutia/4408:
I’m always spinning around when I’m playing, so
this is no sweat!
search_general_talk_ch0215_00_lutia/4409: H-hey! Where are you going, partner?!
search_general_talk_ch0215_00_lutia/4410:
Uh-oh... I was so dizzying, I ended up making
myself dizzy!
